Sentencas: Multi-objective optimization results using genetic algorithm are reported for a cogeneration system based on indirect integration of solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of an indirectly integrated solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine cogeneration system

Sentencas: In this case, solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine operate with different working fluids and at different pressures and only heat is transferred between these two systems.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of an indirectly integrated solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine cogeneration system

Sentencas: A heat recovery unit is placed to provide hot water from solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine exiting stream.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of an indirectly integrated solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine cogeneration system

Sentencas: Multi-objective optimization is applied to determine the optimal design condition in which exergy efficiency is maximum and sum of the unit costs of products is minimum.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of an indirectly integrated solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine cogeneration system

Sentencas: The result demonstrates that final optimal design has an exergy efficiency of 55.11% and sum of the unit costs of products of 170.5 $/GJ, which is a trade-off between thermodynamic and exergoeconomic single-objective optimization cases.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of an indirectly integrated solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine cogeneration system

Sentencas: It is also revealed that heat recovery unit, combustion chamber and afterburner have the most contribution to the system's exergy destruction.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of an indirectly integrated solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine cogeneration system

Sentencas: Furthermore, 44.3% of input exergy is destructed in the system components.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of an indirectly integrated solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine cogeneration system

Sentencas: The overall system exergoeconomic factor is 47.31%.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of an indirectly integrated solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine cogeneration system

Sentencas: Therefore, it is expected that an increase in the components' capital costs may improve the exergoeconomic performance of the system.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of an indirectly integrated solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine cogeneration system

Sentencas: Moreover, it is shown that fuel cell current density and gas turbine inlet air flow rate have the highest effect on the trade-off between the defined objective functions.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of an indirectly integrated solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine cogeneration system
